title: Black Island
creator_credit: Children's Film Foundation, Carole K. Smith and Ben Bolt
brief_description: A children’s adventure film about two young boys, Michael and Joe, who find themselves stranded on a remote island with a couple of escaped convicts. Cast includes Martin Murphy, Mikael Salomon, Michael Elphick, Frank Leigh, Allan Surtees, Norman Tipton.
